price: 65. Fanne nee tekkek а yooboke darqi ruma kaa abak neneeh, sin darqi obtem qajjibsita mara akkuk tenen.
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ حُطَٰمٗا فَظَلۡتُمۡ تَفَكَّهُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: law nashāu lajaʿalnāhu ḥuṭāman faẓaltum tafakkahūna
